heroSubtitle: South Africa's choreographed male revue for bachelorettes, ladies nights and corporate events.
aboutParagraphs: Pulse is choreographed male entertainment built around strong performers, tight routines, and respectful, professional crowd interaction. You decide how wild or conservative; the team adjusts to your crowd.
Hand-picked performers screened for personality, professionalism and crowd control.
heroStatDescription: Choreographed shows, topless & bottomless waiters, games, MCs, custom appearances.
